Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. This item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. Given its significance, I am extending an exclusive offer to you at a price of $500000. I believe this is a fair and reasonable price considering the rarity and quality of the product. I understand that its true value might be subjective to you, but I trust that my proposal will be worthy of your consideration. If you are interested in discussing further details or have any questions, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $500,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $500,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $1,200,000
